meanings.definition: Comparative form of 'shopy': having the most shops or related to shopping.
meanings.sent1: The shoppiest street in town is always bustling with people.
meanings.sent2: This mall is the shoppiest place I've ever been to.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her closet was the shoppiest room in the house.
meanings.sent4: The shoppiest area of the city seemed to glow with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The shoppiest day of the year is definitely Black Friday.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'shopy': having the most shops or related to shopping.
meanings.sent1: It was the shoppiest market I had ever seen, with rows of colorful stalls.
meanings.sent2: The shoppiest store in the entire mall was always crowded with shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The shoppiest moment of the day was when she found the perfect dress on sale.
meanings.sent4: The shoppiest part of the city felt like a treasure trove waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: Her excitement reached its shoppiest peak when she won a shopping spree.
